name: Maritime Hegemony： Carrier Travel 海上霸主：航空母舰之旅
name_original: Maritime Hegemony： Carrier Travel 海上霸主：航空母舰之旅
description:
Game introduction:
"Maritime Hegemony： Carrier Travelr" is a large-scale 3D aircraft carrier ship simulation game that is highly expected. Through the lifelike ship model and lifelike flight disassembly system, the charm of "sea overlord" is reappeared to the players. Make full use of virtual reality technology, let you immerse yourself in the aircraft carrier world!
Bombs flying in the sky, smoke in the air, conquest of the "horn" has sounded, still waiting for what? "Sea monster" is ready to be launched, waiting for you to challenge!

Different game experiences:

Find the tour boat at the wharf according to the guidance, and feel the charm of the carrier fleet at a short distance! Don't worry about not knowing anything, there will be a guide to introduce the carrier formation to you in detail. Ten thousand miles sea area hologram presents in your palm square inch!

New role play games:

It's for military enthusiasts. You can play many roles. You will become a tourist and visit the aircraft carrier formation; you will become a new recruit and perform deck tasks; you can also become a pilot and conduct air combat; or you can change into an engineer to dismantle and assemble the aircraft.

Pattern playing method:

1. You need to pass the examination within the specified time before you can operate the carrier car and fighter freely. Difficulty index four stars.
2. The real air combat mode, driving the "Bumblebee" to fight heartily, flying in the long sky!
3. If you haven't played 3D airplane assembly, you will be out! Come and have a try!
4. More functions and hidden areas are waiting for you to discover!


Game features:
·Modeling technology of sub Era
·Powerful sea effect
·One to one reduction of real aircraft carrier formation
·Real air combat mode
·Outstanding acoustic effect
